Package io.netty.channel

Interface ChannelProgressiveFutureListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, GenericFutureListener<ChannelProgressiveFuture>, GenericProgressiveFutureListener<ChannelProgressiveFuture>
    public interface ChannelProgressiveFutureListener
extends GenericProgressiveFutureListener<ChannelProgressiveFuture>
    An EventListener listener which will be called once the sending task associated with future is being transferred.
